title.default: Was the setup configuration and process useful to you?
title.zh-hans: 设置配置和过程对您有用吗？

title.default: Why was the setup process not useful for you?
title.zh-hans: 为什么设置过程对您没有用？

title.default: What is most important to you?

choices.value: The ability to be guided through connections I need

text.default: The ability to be guided through connections I need
text.zh-hans: 通过我需要的联系进行引导的能力

choices.value: The ability to set environment variables

text.default: The ability to set environment variables

choices.value: Being able to assign users to security groups

text.default: Being able to assign users to security groups
text.zh-hans: 能够将用户分配到安全组

choices.value: Being able to use command line install tools

text.default: Being able to use command line install tools
text.zh-hans: 能够使用命令行安装工具

title.default: What would improve the process for you?

choices.value: Doing a web only install and not install any local tools needed

text.default: Doing a web only install and not install any local tools needed
text.zh-hans: 仅执行Web安装而不安装所需的任何本地工具

choices.value: Having the install as part of [App Source](https://appsource.microsoft.com/) so I can install it

text.default: Having the install as part of [App Source](https://appsource.microsoft.com/) so I can install it
text.zh-hans: 将安装作为 [应用程序源]（https://appsource.microsoft.com/） 的一部分，以便我可以安装它

choices.value: Clear security guidance on what is needed

text.default: Clear security guidance on what is needed
text.zh-hans: 关于所需内容的明确安全指南

choices.value: Industry specific data settings and goals

text.default: Industry specific data settings and goals
text.zh-hans: 行业特定的数据设置和目标

title.default: Do you want to send the results of the your feedback so that the Core Automation Kit team can tailor the localization based on your responses
title.zh-hans: 是否要发送反馈结果，以便核心自动化工具包团队可以根据您的回复定制本地化

html.default: We hope these questions will help you determine an idea of topics or questions if you attend
html.zh-hans: 我们希望这些问题能帮助您确定主题或问题的想法，如果您参加

html.default: We look forward to getting your feedback. As a core Automation Kit team we use the feedback to improve the setup process.
html.zh-hans: 我们期待收到您的反馈。作为核心自动化工具包团队，我们使用反馈来改进设置过程。
